doc:
Cyril Shaps https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyril_Shaps 0 Cyril Leonard Shaps (13 October 1923 – 1 January 2003) was an English actor of radio, television and film, writer, producer and voice artist of Polish-Jewish descent, with a successful career spanning over seven decades, perhaps best known for his appearance in the film The Pianist. Cyril_Leonard_Shaps ( 13_October_1923 – 1_January_2003 ) was an_English_actor of radio_,_television_and_film_,_writer_,_producer_and_voice_artist of Polish-Jewish_descent , with a_successful_career spanning over_seven_decades , perhaps_best_known for his_appearance in the_film The_Pianist .
